551790.name: Time Leap Paradise SUPER LIVE! Encore Pack
551790.description:
By purchasing this DLC, you can soup up Time Leap Paradise SUPER LIVE! with the following content:

-5 characters fully usable in both Solo and Group Dance mode
-A total of 9 available songs, plus remix versions
-20 unique outfits, with special variations for each character
-4 headgear options to choose from

Note:
-The songs available for both main vocalist and backup dancer selection vary for each character.
-Many outfits have unique character-specific designs
-For Komomo only, the Maid Outfit takes the place of the Casual Dress costume

Detailed information on the contents of the DLC can be found below.

[Main Vocalist]
・Ayumu
・Young Ayumu
・Yuu
・Haruka
・Komomo

[Backup Dancer]
